definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
spoon/ladle/CL:把[ba3]/abbr. for 公勺[gong1 shao2], centiliter (unit of volume)
(bird species of China) Far Eastern curlew (Numenius madagascariensis)
(bird species of China) little curlew (Numenius minutus)

sentences.english: New World curlew that breeds in northern North America.
sentences.chinese: 在北美洲北部繁殖的新大陆杓鹬。

sentences.english: However, nationally important numbers of Curlew, Redshank and Golden Plover were also recorded.
sentences.chinese: 然而，数量最多的是杓鹬，脚鹬和灰斑鸻也被记录到。

sentences.english: She drained the water out through a sieve .
She ladled cream over her pudding.
sentences.chinese: 她在布丁上浇了一大杓奶油。

sentences.english: Plastic scoops should not be used for liquid ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 塑料杓不应用于液体原料。

sentences.english: There was a wood ladle chained to the deck.
sentences.chinese: 甲板上拴著一个木长柄杓。

sentences.english: These seven stars form a large bail based on which we can find out the North Star .
sentences.chinese: 这七颗星排列成一个大斗杓，可以用来寻找北极星。

sentences.english: Numenius phaeopus is the new record in Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 中杓鹬为鄱阳湖保护区的新记录。

sentences.english: I used three scoops of flour and one(scoop)of sugar.
sentences.chinese: 我用了三杓面粉和一杓糖。

sentences.english: I used three scoops of flour and one(scoop)of sugar.
sentences.chinese: 我用了三杓面粉和一杓糖。

sentences.english: However, flowering almost did not affect the photosynthetic capacity of C. guttatum.
sentences.chinese: 但是紫点杓兰的光合作用在开花阶段几乎没有变化。

sentences.english: ABPM curve of 30 (81%) patients with AHAPE showed non-dipper change.
sentences.chinese: 有30例患者的动态血压曲线呈非杓型改变。

definition: to pour wine/to drink wine/to deliberate/to consider
